Marvell wireless settings

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
1.0.1 2016-10-19 Added AdvancedMarvell2 service that supports configuration of WiFi MU-MIMO settings.

Added the following:
  • action GetAdvancedSettings
  • action SetAdvancedSettings

Services

AdvancedMarvell

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/AdvancedMarvell
Marvell-specific advanced settings service.

Service Actions

  • GetTxBFSettings
  • SetTxBFSettings

AdvancedMarvell2

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/AdvancedMarvell2
Marvell-specific advanced wireless settings service.

Service Actions

  • GetAdvancedSettings
  • SetAdvancedSettings

Actions

GetAdvancedSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/GetAdvancedSettings
Get advanced wireless settings specific to Marvell platforms.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isMUMIMOSupported bool no Whether MU-MIMO is supported on the platform.
advancedRadioSettings MarvellAdvancedRadioSettings[] no The list of advanced settings for each radio.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/GetAdvancedSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/GetAdvancedSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isMUMIMOSupported": true,
    "advancedRadioSettings": [
      {
        "radioID": "RADIO_2.4GHz",
        "isTxBFEnabled": true,
        "isTxBF3x3Only": true,
        "isMUMIMOEnabled": true
      }
    ]
  }
}

GetTxBFSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/GetTxBFSettings
Get transmit beam forming settings specific to Marvell platforms.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
txbfEnabled bool no Is transmit beam forming enabled?
txbf3x3Only bool no Transmit beam forming for 3x3 streams only?

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/GetTxBFSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/GetTxBFSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "txbfEnabled": true,
    "txbf3x3Only": true
  }
}

SetAdvancedSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/SetAdvancedSettings
Set advanced wireless settings specific to Marvell platforms.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
advancedRadioSettings MarvellAdvancedRadioSettings[] no The list of advanced settings for each radio.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/SetAdvancedSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorUnknownRadio One of the specified radio IDs in advancedRadioSettings does not correspond to an actual radio in the access point.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/SetAdvancedSettings"

{
  "advancedRadioSettings": [
    {
      "radioID": "RADIO_2.4GHz",
      "isTxBFEnabled": true,
      "isTxBF3x3Only": true,
      "isMUMIMOEnabled": true
    }
  ]
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetTxBFSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/SetTxBFSettings
Get transmit beam forming settings specific to Marvell platforms.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
txbfEnabled bool no Is transmit beam forming enabled?
txbf3x3Only bool no Transmit beam forming for 3x3 streams only?

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/SetTxBFSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/SetTxBFSettings"

{
  "txbfEnabled": true,
  "txbf3x3Only": true
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

MarvellAdvancedRadioSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/wirelessap/marvell/MarvellAdvancedRadioSettings
This service provides access to Marvell wireless driver settings. Advanced configuration settings of a Marvell wireless radio.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
radioID string no The unique identifier of the radio. This value never changes for a particular radio, and no two radios on the same wireless access point will have the same radio ID.
isTxBFEnabled bool no Is transmit beam forming enabled?
isTxBF3x3Only bool no Transmit beam forming for 3x3 streams only.
isMUMIMOEnabled bool yes The Marvell-specific behavior of MU-MIMO. This parameter will only be present if MU-MIMO is suppored on the platform.
